sentence: Shares of Builders FirstSource, Inc.BLDR touched a new 52-week high of $15.69 during its trading session on Sep 3.
This apex improved upon the last 52-week high of $15.50 hit on Aug 19.
Builders FirstSource closed the session at $15.33, reflecting a solid year-to-date return of 123.1%.
The trading volume for the session was 1.7 million shares.
After the company reported better-than-expected results for second quarter, earnings estimates for 2015 were revised upward, reflecting further upward potential for this building products stock.
A couple of events in the last two months have lifted investors' confidence in Builders FirstSource.
Firstly, the company surprised its shareholders and the market at large with solid second-quarter results.
Earnings of 14 cents per share surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate of 4 cents by 250%.
Net sales grew 8.2% year over year driven by organic volume growth and benefits reaped from acquired assets.
Builders FirstSource expects better employment conditions, low new home inventory and low mortgage rates to aid its business in the remaining quarters of 2015.
In addition, the company completed the acquisition of ProBuild Holdings LLC, a professional building materials supplier, at July-end.
The newly added assets are anticipated to boost the company's operational abilities as well as enhance its products and services portfolio.
Over the last 60 days, the Zacks Consensus Estimate for Builders FirstSource increased 45% to 29 cents per share for 2015, while the same grew 66.7% to 10 cents for third-quarter 2015.
These estimates represent year-over-year growth of 59.3% for 2015 and 50% for the third quarter.
With a market capitalization of $1.7 billion, Builders FirstSource currently carries a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).
Better-ranked stocks in the building products industry include Comfort Systems USA Inc.
FIX , The Home Depot, Inc. HD and Energy Focus, Inc. EFOI .
While Comfort Systems USA sports a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), both The Home Depot and Energy Focus carry a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
